Name: Magician
Notes: Think a street magician or the sort of magician who might perform at childrens parties

Name: Space Marine
Notes: Big army guy in a space suit with a plasma cannon

Name: Hothead
Notes: A fireball with legs and a face. Looks like a biker.

Name: Slime
Notes: Like an ice cream cone – but instead of ice cream contains slime

Name: Frog
Notes: A tiny frog with a very big sword

Name: Sticky Hands
Notes: A kid on a skateboard with an extendable glove that steals items from you

Name: Bully
Notes: A big mean guy who throws rocks at you

Name: Alchemist
Notes: A female chemist – can use a potion that transforms into a bear

Name: Copycat
Notes: Looks like a big mirror wearing a cloak – copies your moves

Name: Mimic
Notes: A monster hiding in a treasure chest

Name: Sorceress
Notes: A witch on a broomstrick - distractedly reading her phone

Name: Stereohead
Notes: A man in a suit with a stereo for a head

Name: Keymaster
Notes: A thin man decorated with dozens of keys over his hands and face

Name: Sneezy
Notes: A hedgehog with a cold – when it sneezes it's spines fly out and attack you

Name: Dire Wolf
Notes: The older parent of the baby wolf from before

Name: Handyman
Notes: A handyman. Has six hands and lots of tools

Name: Fireman
Notes: LITERALLY A MAN MADE OUT OF FIRE - Not a firefighter

Name: Kraken
Notes: The older parent of the baby squid from before

Name: Snowman
Notes: A handsome man made out of snow

Name: Rat King
Notes: A giant rat with a crown and lots of little rats around it.

Name: Loud Bird
Notes: A big bird like a pelican - it's wearing headphones

Name: Haunted Jar
Notes: A small angry pot dancing around on the floor. It's filled with poison and curses

Name: Banshee
Notes: A creature from Irish mythology - spooky old woman a bit like the girl from The Ring but older

Name: Crystalina
Notes: A magical creature made out of crystals

Name: Cornelius
Notes: A scary shadowy figure from my own childhood. A bit like slenderman

Name: Paper Knight
Notes: A small girl wearing a sword and shield and armour made from cardboard

Name: Skeleton
Notes: A skeleton with a very big sword

Name: Wicker Man
Notes: A man made out of twigs

Name: Yeti
Notes: A mythological creature that lives in snowy mountains

Name: Madison
Notes: Previously girl scout – a tiny American girl who sells cookies to raise money for charity

Name: Fomorian
Notes: A creature from Irish mythology – supposed to be a giant with horns but artwork currently doesn't match

Name: Champion
Notes: A bored looking female knight with a big shield (previously: Knight)

Name: Scathach
Notes: A powerful warrior from Irish mythology. Looks like a young amoured female soldier

Name: Rose
Notes: A rose like the flower with a sword and shield

Name: Warlock
Notes: An old man in a cloak who casts occult spells

Name: Wisp
Notes: A small glowing ghost figure made out of fire

Name: Gym Leader
Notes: A super strong heavy female weight lifter

Name: Aoife
Notes: Scathach's sister in Irish mythology. Aoife is a relatively common Irish first name pronounced Eee-Fa - rhymes with Tifa

Name: Lady Luck
Notes: A goddess of chance and fortune – greek mythology calls her Tyche – Roman mythology calls her Fortuna. She is the presenter of the Dicey Dungeons gameshow.

Name: Cactus
Notes: A worried looking cactus plant – holding a spear and a small shield

Name: Pirate
Notes: A very large pirate with a ginger beard

Name: Bounty Hunter
Notes: A green space alien wearing a monocle and leaning against a futuristic motorcycle

Name: Aurora
Notes: A weather goddess surrounded by clouds and storms. Named for Roman god of dawn

Name: Rhino Beetle
Notes: A tough looking beetle with a big axe

Name: Cowboy
Notes: A cat dressed up in cowboy gear

Name: Drain Monster
Notes: A slimy monster that maybe lives in a drain or sewer

Name: Rotten Apple
Notes: Looks like an apple on the map but is an enemy with a worm in it

Name: Lady Luck[]
Notes: Lady Lucks name as it appears in the credits screen (needed for grammer reasons)
